ðŸ“– Summary: WayPoint is a fast, lightweight URL mapping and redirection system that dynamically manages URL shortcuts through YAML configuration files. It offers features like human-readable shortcuts, hierarchical organization, real-time updates, and flexible deployment options. It can be used as a server for web access or integrated with your shell for command-line usage.
